title: MAVERICK 104 Ghost Rider [retr?tv]
description:
MAVERICK 1x04 Ghost Rider    13 Oct 1957

Bret is tracking the kid (Edd "Kookie" Byrnes) who robbed him of $3000. Then when he gallantly gives a distressed woman a ride home, she disappears and he later discovers she has been dead for over a week.

Stars James Garner as Bret Maverick 
Guest Stars:gs: Edd "Kookie" Byrnes (The Kid), Joanna Barnes (Mary Owen Shane), Rhodes Reason (Hank Foster aka.Felton), Willard Sage (Bert Nicholson), Stacy Keach (Sheriff),  Dan Sheridan (Sideburns), Charles Tannen (Stableman), John Cliff (Deputy)

MPEG1/320x240/50min

*REPOST* of a file originally posted on demonoid last year on the 50th anniversary of this episode. Another ep with Kookie!
